Description: We're looking for a FIT OUT Site Supervisor with at least a minimum of 4-6YEARS of experience in the same field in an interior company.Responsibilities:*Supervising experience in Fit-Out interior works (Factory and site).*Knowledge of drawings and implementing to site.*Inspecting construction sites regularly to identify and eliminate potential safety hazards.*Supervising and instructing the construction team as well as subcontractors.*Educating site workers on construction safety regulations and accident protocol.*Enforcing site safety rules to minimize work-related accidents and injuries.*Handling site accidents in accordance with established accident protocol.*Maintaining an accurate record of construction employee attendance.*Evaluating the performance of construction employees and instituting disciplinary measures as needed.*Analyzing blueprints to ensure that construction projects meet design, safety, and budget specifications.*Must have a working knowledge of MEP, Civil, Architectural and Interior.*Recommending changes to construction operations or procedures to increase efficiency.Skills
Skills:
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree ''Civil Eng." or related field is preferred.
Proven experience working as a site supervisor.
Sound knowledge of building codes and construction safety regulations including
Working knowledge of construction tools and equipment.
Knowledge in solid in Interior Designing/Joinery/ Fit Out Industry
Self-reliance & ability in #AutoCADand #Microsoftoffice.
Outstanding #leadershipskills.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent in #English written and communication skills
Attention to detail and strong problem-solving abilities.
Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Knowledge of health, safety, and environmental regulations in construction.
With UAE valid Driving License
